lines.text: [a student has written "Awww Dalzeil" on the evidence board]
I before E except after C and especially after the Z in my name.
And you, do you take any responsibility in any of this?
God no! I'm a child of the 80's, there's no such thing as society
And who organized the bus crash?
Well that really was an act of God.
What, you believe that there is a superior being? Superior to you?
Maybe... But if the post falls vacant, I'll gladly apply
